title.rendered: Cody Devers: Net Worth 2023, Career Earnings

content.rendered:
Summary

  • About Cody Devers
    • Early Career 
    • Professional Career 
  • Cody Devers’s Net Worth in 2023
    • Career Earnings
  • Personal Details
    • Girlfriend 
    • How old is he?
    • How tall is he?
    • What is his nationality?
    • FAQs About Cody Devers 

Cody Devers is a professional rodeo contestant known for his exceptional skills in steer wrestling. Born and raised in Perryton, Texas, Devers was introduced to the world of rodeo at a young age. His parents, Marty and Sabrina Devers were both involved in rodeo and horse training, providing a strong foundation for Cody’s future career.

Here you can follow Cody Devers’s net worth, career earnings, professional career, achievements, relationship status, and more.

About Cody Devers

Cody Devers was born into a family with a rich rodeo history. His father, Marty Devers, was a former PRCA rodeo cowboy who competed in tie-down and steer wrestling, while his mother, Sabrina Devers, is a Reserve World Champion Barrel racer and Texas 1D State Champion Barrel racer. Cody’s early exposure to rodeo and horse training played a significant role in shaping his career.

Early Career 

Devers began his rodeo career at a young age, jumping his first steer off a horse when he was only 12. His early achievements include winning the Texas JHSRA Region 1 and being a Top 10 finalist at the NJHSRA Finals for Texas. 

He also won the Kansas State both KJHSRA and KHSRA associations, winning an NHSRA Finals go-round for KHSRA.

Professional Career 

Cody Devers has made significant strides in his professional rodeo career. He qualified for the National Finals Rodeo (NFR) for the first time in 2021. In 2023, he won the Sundre (Alberta) Pro Rodeo and the Omaha (Neb.) River City Rodeo.

In 2021, Devers won the Livingston (Montana) Roundup Rodeo, and the Wild Bill Hickok Rodeo (Abilene, Kansas), and was a co-champion at the Ellensburg (Wash.) Rodeo and the Santa Rosa Roundup (Vernon, Texas).

In 2023, he was the fastest steer wrestler in Stephenville, Texas, at the Cowboy Capital of the World PRCA Rodeo. He also cashed in at RodeoHouston at the tail end of March.

Devers’s professional career has been marked by hard work and determination. He has consistently demonstrated his ability to compete at the highest level, even in the face of adversity. His achievements in the rodeo arena are a testament to his skill, dedication, and passion for the sport.

Cody Devers’s Net Worth in 2023

As of 2023, Cody Devers’s net worth is $1 million.

Career Earnings

As of December 1, 2023, Cody Devers has career earnings of $263,940 in professional rodeo. In 2022, he ranked 33rd in the world standings and earned $47,021.

Some of his career highlights include winning the Livingston Roundup Rodeo, and Wild Bill Hickok Rodeo, and being a co-champion at the Ellensburg Rodeo and Santa Rosa Roundup.

Personal Details

Girlfriend 

Cody Devers is currently single. He is focusing on his career only.

How old is he?

 As of 2023, he is 28 years old.

How tall is he?

He stands tall at 6’1”.

What is his nationality?

He is of American nationality.

FAQs About Cody Devers 

When did he qualify for the NFR?

He qualified for the NFR in 2021.

What is his net worth?

As of 2023, his net worth is $1 million.

What is Cody Devers’s height?

Cody Devers is 6’1″ tall.
